. Located in the small section of East Palo Alto that is located on the Palo Alto side of the freeway in a safe location.

East Palo Alto is known locally as one of the more dangerous cities in the Bay Area; it is not a town for random sightseeing.  There are many perfectly decent shops and restaurants, but it is best to know where you are going and not to wander aimlessly.
